meanings.sent1: The gambirs in the forest provide shade and shelter for many animals.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the unique leaves of the gambirs in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkeys played hide-and-seek among the gambirs.
meanings.sent4: The gambirs stood tall like guardians of the rainforest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the gambirs danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A substance derived from the leaves of the gambir tree, used in tanning and dyeing.
meanings.sent1: The tanner used gambirs to create rich, brown leather for shoes.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed the colorful dyes with gambirs to achieve the perfect shade.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer accidentally spilled gambirs all over the workshop!
meanings.sent4: The scent of gambirs filled the air, reminding her of the lush forest.
meanings.sent5: The ancient recipe called for a pinch of gambirs to enhance the color.

meanings.sent1: The craftsman decided to gambirs the leather to make it more durable.
meanings.sent2: She carefully gambirs the fabric to ensure it retains its vibrant color.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully gambirs the dish with a sprinkle of the special ingredient.
meanings.sent4: He gambirs his stories with humor to entertain the children.
meanings.sent5: The gardener gently gambirs the plants to protect them from pests.
